languages.text: Время потянулось бесконечной вереницей, и когда команда уже начала сходить с ума, Лорд-капитан решил выйти из варпа, наплевав на то, настал ли для этого нужный момент. Однако Навигатор сообщил, что вы пробыли там куда дольше положенного, застряв в аномалии у точки выхода, и прибыли не туда, куда собирались. Не все члены экипажа пережили этот затянувшийся перелет.

traits.locale_text: Время потянулось бесконечной вереницей, и когда команда уже начала сходить с ума, Лорд-капитан решил выйти из варпа, наплевав на то, настал ли для этого нужный момент. Однако Навигатор сообщил, что вы пробыли там куда дольше положенного, застряв в аномалии у точки выхода, и прибыли не туда, куда собирались. Не все члены экипажа пережили этот затянувшийся перелет.

languages.text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator reported the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location. Not all crew members survived the prolonged long journey.
languages.original_text: Время потянулось бесконечной вереницей, и когда команда уже начала сходить с ума, Лорд-капитан решил выйти из варпа, наплевав на то, настал ли для этого нужный момент. Однако Навигатор сообщил, что вы пробыли там куда дольше положенного, застряв в аномалии у точки выхода, и прибыли не туда, куда собирались. Не все члены экипажа пережили этот затянувшийся перелет.

traits.locale_text: Time stretched in endless drudgery, and when the crew started going insane Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of whether the time for it was right. However, the navigator reported the vessel spent far more time in the Immaterium than had been expected, got stranded in an anomaly next to the point of egress and arrived not where it had been meant to. Not all crew members survived the long-running journey.

However, the navigator reported the vessel spent far more time in the Immaterium than had been expected, got stranded in an anomaly next to the point of egress and arrived not where it had been meant to. Not all crew members survived the long-running journey.

It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location. Not all crew members survived the prolonged long journey.

Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator reported the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location. Not all crew members survived the prolonged long journey.

languages.text: 时间本身被拉成了某种无休无止的单调折磨。当船员们接连陷入疯狂时，领主舰长决定不顾一切后果，跳出亚空间。然而，导航者的报告显示，这艘飞船在亚空间中停留的时间已经远远超出了预期。看来这艘船在脱离亚空间的过程中搁了浅，抵达了某个意料之外的地方。并非所有船员都在这场漫长的长途旅行中幸存下来。
languages.original_text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator reported the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location. Not all crew members survived the prolonged long journey.

traits.locale_text: 时间本身被拉成了某种无休无止的单调折磨。当船员们接连陷入疯狂时，领主舰长决定不顾一切后果，跳出亚空间。然而，导航者的报告显示，这艘飞船在亚空间中停留的时间已经远远超出了预期。看来这艘船在脱离亚空间的过程中搁了浅，抵达了某个意料之外的地方。并非所有船员都在这场漫长的长途旅行中幸存下来。

languages.text: El tiempo se alargaba en una monotonía interminable. Cuando la tripulación empezó a caer en la locura, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán decidió salir de la disformidad sin importarle las consecuencias. Sin embargo, la Navegante informó de que la nave había pasado mucho más tiempo en el Inmaterio de lo esperado. Al parecer, la nave había quedado atrapada en una anomalía en el punto de salida y había llegado a un lugar inesperado. No todos los miembros de la tripulación sobrevivieron al largo y prolongado viaje.
languages.original_text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator reported the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location. Not all crew members survived the prolonged long journey.

traits.locale_text: El tiempo se alargaba en una monotonía interminable. Cuando la tripulación empezó a caer en la locura, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán decidió salir de la disformidad sin importarle las consecuencias. Sin embargo, la Navegante informó de que la nave había pasado mucho más tiempo en el Inmaterio de lo esperado. Al parecer, la nave había quedado atrapada en una anomalía en el punto de salida y había llegado a un lugar inesperado. No todos los miembros de la tripulación sobrevivieron al largo y prolongado viaje.

languages.text: 時間は終わらない単調な仕事のように長かった。クルーが狂気へ堕ち始めたとき、ロード・キャプテンはどうなってもいいから<歪み>から出ることに決める。しかし航宙士は、船が予想よりもはるかに多くの時間を非物質世界で過ごしていた事を報告する。船は脱出時に変異点で座礁して、想定外の場所に到着したようだ。その結果、全てのクルーが長い旅路を生き残ることは叶わなかった。
languages.original_text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator reported the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location. Not all crew members survived the prolonged long journey.

traits.locale_text: 時間は終わらない単調な仕事のように長かった。クルーが狂気へ堕ち始めたとき、ロード・キャプテンはどうなってもいいから<歪み>から出ることに決める。しかし航宙士は、船が予想よりもはるかに多くの時間を非物質世界で過ごしていた事を報告する。船は脱出時に変異点で座礁して、想定外の場所に到着したようだ。その結果、全てのクルーが長い旅路を生き残ることは叶わなかった。

languages.text: Le fil du temps s'étire en une interminable routine. Alors que l'équipage commence à sombrer dans la folie, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} prend la décision de quitter le Warp, quelles qu'en soient les conséquences. Selon la navigatrice, le vaisseau a passé nettement plus de temps que prévu dans l'Immaterium. De toute évidence, le vaisseau a échoué dans une anomalie au point de sortie et a atteint une destination inattendue. Tout le monde n'a pas survécu à cet interminable voyage.
languages.original_text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator reported the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location. Not all crew members survived the prolonged long journey.

traits.locale_text: Le fil du temps s'étire en une interminable routine. Alors que l'équipage commence à sombrer dans la folie, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} prend la décision de quitter le Warp, quelles qu'en soient les conséquences. Selon la navigatrice, le vaisseau a passé nettement plus de temps que prévu dans l'Immaterium. De toute évidence, le vaisseau a échoué dans une anomalie au point de sortie et a atteint une destination inattendue. Tout le monde n'a pas survécu à cet interminable voyage.

languages.text: Die Zeit verkam zu endloser Plackerei. Als die Crew begann, in den Wahnsinn abzugleiten, entschied der Lord Captain, den Warp zu verlassen, ganz gleich, welche Konsequenzen das auch haben mochte. Der Navigator berichtete jedoch, dass das Schiff sehr viel länger als erwartet im Immaterium gewesen war. Offenbar war das Schiff am Ausgangspunkt in einer Anomalie gestrandet und daher an einem unbeabsichtigten Zielort angekommen. Nicht alle Crewmitglieder überlebten die unerwartet lange Reise.
languages.original_text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator reported the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location. Not all crew members survived the prolonged long journey.

languages.text: Zaman, sonsuz bir angaryaya dönüştü. Mürettebatın deliliğe sürüklenmeye başlaması üzerine Lord Kaptan, sonuçları ne olursa olsun öteboyuttan çıkmaya karar verdi. Ancak Rotacı, geminin Tindiyar'da beklenenden çok daha uzun zaman geçirdiğini bildiriyordu. Anlaşıldığı kadarıyla gemi, çıkış noktasında bir anomaliye sıkışmış ve hiç de amaçlanmayan bir konuma ulaşmıştı. Fazlasıyla uzun süren bu yolculuktan bazı mürettebat üyeleri sağ çıkamadı.
languages.original_text: Time stretched into endless drudgery. When the crew began their descent into madness, the Lord Captain decided to exit the warp regardless of the consequences. However, the Navigator reported the vessel had spent far more time in the Immaterium than was expected. It seems the vessel had gotten stranded in an anomaly at the point of egress and arrived at an unintended location. Not all crew members survived the prolonged long journey.
